settings.faq-title: WHY ARE RICHARD MILLE WATCHES SO EXPENSIVE?
settings.faq-content: Rachard Mille’s iconic tonneau-shaped case is very difficult to create. Hand-made watchmaking is extremely laborious and involves the highest level of technical mastery. Not only is the design revolutionary, so are the cutting-edge materials. All of that combined means not many watches can be produced each year, giving the watches that do get made a very elite status symbol.
